messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2148
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/6/2002 11:18:09 PM Pacific Daylight Time, ... The guy that killed Bill Cosby s son went to our local high school. So did Jeremy Strohmeyer
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/6/2002 11:18:09 PM Pacific Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> You're making sense. And didn't the Unabomber, Manson, and Bundy all go to
> school?

The guy that killed Bill Cosby's son went to our local high school. So did
Jeremy Strohmeyer who was the guy that killed the little girl in the las
vegas casino.

--pam

National Home Education Network
http://www.NHEN.org
Changing the Way the World Sees Homeschooling!
